idea-plugin.name: Grep Console
idea-plugin.description:
Allows you to define a series of regular expressions which will be tested against the console output or currently opened file. Each expression matching a line will affect the style of the entire line, or play a sound. For example, error messages could be set to show up with a red background.

Inspired by Grep Console plugin for Eclipse and Ansi Console plugin for Eclipse.
